title: How to see complete call history of a contact?
content:
**Update:** 


Looks like Google have fixed this. I am on Pixel 3 and now I can see history of selected contact with date and call duration. 

----

I followed this: 
https://support.google.com/phoneapp/answer/2811854?hl=en  

It says:  
Youâ€™ll see details for each call made to that number, like when it happened, how long it was, and whether it was incoming or outgoing  


But I am not able to see all calls. All I see is single day's call. 
When I click on call details of contact whom I called today, it shows me all calls I made to him today. 
If I click on call details of same contact from some earlier day, it shows all calls made to him on that particular day.   


I contacted customer care.  We did screen share. We cleared cache and uninstall updates of Phone app.  But still the same.  

Anyone else facing same issue?  

Pixel 3,   stock phone app.
